5.eng-name: Establishing the Prayer and the Sunnah Regarding Them

hadiths.text: Telah menceritakan kepada kami [Muhammad bin Rumh] berkata, telah memberitakan kepada kami [Al Laits bin Sa'd] dari [Nafi'] dari [Abdullah bin Umar] Bahwasanya jika telah selesai shalat jum'at ia shalat dua raka'at di rumah, kemudian ia berkata, "Rasulullah shallallahu 'alaihi wasallam melakukan hal itu

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الصَّلاَةِ بَعْدَ الْجُمُعَةِ
chapter.eng-name: What was narrated concerning Prayer after Friday
